title: The Eternity Man (film)
text:
The Eternity Man is a 2008 tele-film adaptation of the <a href="opera">opera</a> "<a href="The%20Eternity%20Man">The Eternity Man</a>" by composer <a href="Jonathan%20Mills%20%28composer%29">Jonathan Mills</a> and librettist <a href="Dorothy%20Porter">Dorothy Porter</a>.
The film follows the life of <a href="Arthur%20Stace">Arthur Stace</a>. The film was a co-production of <a href="ABC%20Television%20%28Australian%20TV%20network%29">ABC Television</a> and <a href="Channel%204">Channel 4</a>, and won a <a href="Rose%20d%27Or">Rose d'Or</a>.
